alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and eastern Putnam Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Hastings, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. Downpours may coincide with this evening`s high tide to create localized flooding in areas such as downtown Saint Augustine. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia and Saint Augustine Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
